trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The calm observer's colleague has been gone too long.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Thalassai observer.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_TODO_01<tab>Feed the Zephyros 72s.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the Zephyros 72s to the Thalassai observer.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the Thalassai observer.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERA04298_000_000<tab>May I ask a favor? A colleague of mine from the Thalassai is overdue to make his report, and I need someone to give him a gentle nudge.

TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERA04298_000_001<tab>He's currently over at Rumination's Ramble, observing some life-forms newly hatched from one of our creations, but I'm afraid I'll skew the data if I show up and startle them.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERA04298_000_002<tab>A familiar like you, however, should cause much less of a disruption. Would you be so kind...?
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERA04298_000_003<tab>You can find my associate at Rumination's Ramble.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILEA04298_100_001<tab><rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILEB04298_100_002<tab><rustle> ...?
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILEC04298_100_003<tab><rustle> <rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILED04298_100_004<tab><rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_004<tab>A familiar? Can I help you with something?
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_005<tab>Oh, time to head back, is it? I was so enraptured watching the young ones frolic that I lost track of time.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_006<tab>Come, come, everyone! We really must be going!
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_007<tab>(-Zephyros 72-)<rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_008<tab>Still want to play, do you? I guess we shall have to appeal to your bellies, then!
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_009<tab>Would you like to try feeding them?
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_010<tab>They become much more compliant after eating some of these treats. And they're so adorable when they nibble!
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_011<tab>Go ahead and feed them some treats.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILEA04298_000_013<tab><rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILEA04298_000_014<tab><rustle> <rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILEB04298_000_015<tab><rustle> ...?
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILEB04298_000_016<tab><rustle> <rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILEC04298_000_017<tab><rustle> ...
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILEC04298_000_018<tab><rustle> <rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILED04298_000_019<tab><rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_JUVENILED04298_000_020<tab><rustle> <rustle>
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_021<tab>Isn't it fun watching them romp around?
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_022<tab>And they really seemed to like you! Do you work with young ones often?
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_023<tab>These babies are aquatic creatures by nature, but we're modifying them to adapt to life on land.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_024<tab>They mostly eat marine insects and shellfish, and some of the larger carnivores feed off them in turn.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_025<tab>They also carry their eggs on their backs until they're ready to hatch. Fascinating, aren't they?
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_026<tab>Oh, but that's not why you're here, is it!? I really must head back!
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERA04298_000_027<tab>Thank you for fetching my associate.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_028<tab>If you hadn't been sent to fetch me, I might have been out there for days.
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERB04298_000_029<tab>In any case, it's only a matter of time before our creations are approved for release into the wild. I wonder what name they'll receive...
TEXT_AKTKZH003_04298_OBSERVERA04298_000_030<tab>Thank you for all your help today. Here, as thanks.
